thread.title: FAANG stocks have outsize effect on broader market, says Exponential ETFs' Josh Blechman.

title: FAANG stocks have outsize effect on broader market, says Exponential ETFs' Josh Blechman.
text:
FAANG stocks have outsize effect on broader market, says Exponential ETFs' Josh Blechman.   05:37 
Over 15 percent of the S&P 500 weight is in FAANG and Microsoft stocks, giving them an outsize effect on the U.S. market, says Josh Blechman, director of capital markets at Exponential ETFs. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
